title: Kate Wagner (from McMansion Hell) was sent to an F1 race by...
content:
Kate Wagner (from McMansion Hell) was sent to an F1 race by Road & Track and the resulting article was published and then, poof, vanished. (Archived here!) ‚ÄúIf you wanted to turn someone into a socialist you could [show them] the paddock of a Formula 1 race.‚Äù

author: Jason Kottke
